regex.name: makelist
regex.expres:
#$pyFunction def GetLSProData(page_data,Cookie_Jar,m,url = ''): from resources.lib.modules import client,control import re,urllib url = '' url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=Rick+and+Morty&title_type=tv_series') url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=Beavis+and+Butt-Head+Do+America&title_type=feature&sort=moviemeter,asc')
url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=Dracula+contra+Frankenstein&title_type=feature&sort=moviemeter,asc')
url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=Billy+Frankenstein&title_type=feature&sort=moviemeter,asc')
url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=Blondie&title_type=feature&sort=moviemeter,asc')
url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=Ham+and+the+Masked+Marvel&title_type=feature&sort=moviemeter,asc')
url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=The+Musical+Marvel&title_type=feature&sort=moviemeter,asc')
url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=Azuloscurocasinegro&title_type=feature&sort=moviemeter,asc')
url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=D-Day+on+Mars&title_type=feature&sort=moviemeter,asc')
url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=El+Camino+de+las+Hormigas&title_type=feature&sort=moviemeter,asc')
url += client.request('https://www.imdb.com/search/title?title=Novecento&title_type=feature&sort=moviemeter,asc')
express = re.findall('(?s)class="lister-item-image float-left">.+?alt="(.+?)".+?loadlate="(.+?)".+?data-tconst="(.+?)".+?unbold">(.+?)<', url) return express
